document.full_text: threatened with thousands of layoffs, representatives for state employees agreed to a deal to produce what gov. dannel p. malloy has called a balanced budget with pain for everyone.
document.title: connecticut unions agree to $1.6 billion in givebacks
lines_and_colors: threatened with thousands of layoffs, representatives for state employees agreed to a deal to produce what gov. dannel p. malloy has called a balanced budget with pain for everyone.
